name: City Bus Driver
description:
From the developers of Bus Parking 3D.
Welcome to City Bus Driver.
As a driver you will transport passengers between the bus stops. Follow the red arrow to find next bus stop. Earn money and XP to unlock new vehicles and missions. Obey traffic rules, otherwise you will be fined. Default steering control is tilting. You can change contol type any time in settings window. Now, complete your training mission to start as a part-time driver in the company.
- Optimized game performance
- Realistic vehicle pyhsics, high quality graphics and unlimited missions.
- Tilting, button or steering wheel controls.
- Support us so we can add more buses.
